author: Sheena McGinley
title: Beaut.ie Fix - the most popular stories on Beaut.ie: hues to suit pale skin, serums, cult skincare
text:
This week we have the lowdown on all things Penney's stateside (it's Primark, but same thing... innit?), as well as all the action from the recent Inside Soap Awards. If it's skin your into, we also have details regarding M&S's cult Skincare range, our top skin serums, the best foundations for pale skin, Benefit's Christmas sets, and a Can You Spot The Difference special featuring MAC and Wet 'n Wild.
1. Penneys Stateside - What's The Deal?
How is Boston’s Primark Different to Our Penneys?
2. The Inside Soap Awards 2015
All the action from the red capet - the LBD was all the rage
3. Have You Seen the Cult Skincare Range?
Available from your M&S
4. Aldi’s New Skin Care!
It's dressed up as La Praire for Halloween
5. Tried and Tested
3 Skin Serums, 3 Reviews
6. Can You Tell Which is Which?
It's a MAC vs Wet ‘n’ Wild special
7. Pale Skinned Lovely?
Here's our five favourite foundations, plus our top three budget products for your hue.
8. Three Stand Out Sets from Benefit
Christmas 2015 is just around the corner, ya know
9. Irish Fashion!
Exposure Spring Summer show
10. Keith Duffy's Asian Charity Fundraiser
In aid of for Irish Autism Action
